About Sideview

This app is developed by Sideview, LLC. Sideview develops and sells its own Splunk apps, and does a little bit of Splunk consulting on the side sometimes.

Sideview was founded by Nick Mealy in September 2010. Nick was the 7th employee at Splunk although this depends a bit on how you count. At any rate he worked there between 2005 and 2010. He held various titles over those 5 years like Principal User Interface Engineer, User Interface Manager, and Mad Scientist. You may also have run into him on answers.splunk.com. And if you're reading this you've probably read quite a lot of his copy already. Feel free to email me at nick@sideviewapps.com for any reason whatsoever. Also you can check out my website for more information.
